mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.weisin_user_info_id AS "weisinUserInfo.id", a.user_name AS "userName", a.password AS "password", a.name AS "name", a.tel AS "tel", a.last_login_time AS "lastLoginTime", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
LEFT JOIN weixin_user_info b ON b.id = a.weisin_user_info_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM weixin_admin_user a
AND a.weisin_user_info_id LIKE '%'||#{weisinUserInfo.id}||'%' '%'+#{weisinUserInfo.id}+'%' concat('%',#{weisinUserInfo.id},'%')
AND a.user_name LIKE '%'||#{userName}||'%' '%'+#{userName}+'%' concat('%',#{userName},'%')
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.tel LIKE '%'||#{tel}||'%' '%'+#{tel}+'%' concat('%',#{tel},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.create_date ASC

SELECT
FROM weixin_admin_user a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.create_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weixin_admin_user( id, weisin_user_info_id, user_name, password, name, tel, last_login_time, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{weisinUserInfo.id}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE weixin_admin_user SET weisin_user_info_id = #{weisinUserInfo.id}, user_name = #{userName}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, tel = #{tel}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
